definition: component in Chinese characters/archaic variant of 毫[hao2]/archaic variant of 乙[yi3]

sentences.english: It suggested that gadolinium chloride could alleviate lung injury, but not prevent lung injury.
sentences.chinese: 表明应用氯化钆可减轻肺损伤，但不能完全预防。

sentences.english: The article focus on the scintillant performance Gadolinium glass _ a new type of scintillator.
sentences.chinese: 本文对钆玻璃的闪烁性能做出了初步的研究。

sentences.english: There is very little enhancement with gadolinium.
sentences.chinese: 用钆造影后信号几乎没有加强。

sentences.english: Gadolinium-diethylenetriamine pentaacetic acid (Gd-DTPA)-dimeglumine injection solution was used as the contrast medium.
sentences.chinese: 钆喷酸二甲葡胺注射液被使用为造影剂。

sentences.english: We take it that you would agree with us and accept our way of packing.
sentences.chinese: 我们箱钆你方会同意我们的意见，接受纸板箱包装。

sentences.english: The trial's primary end point was the reduction in the number of gadolinium-enhancing lesions.
sentences.chinese: 试验的主要终点是钆增强病变数目的减少。

sentences.english: The elements which have been studied most are those from gadolinium to thulium .
sentences.chinese: 研究得最多的是从钆到铥之间的元素。

pinyin: fang4 she4 xing4 tong2 wei4 su4

definition: propranolol (beta-blocker used to treat high blood pressure)
